title: microcopy prompts
description: write helpful, concise product microcopy for a ui surface.
context: be friendly and clear; avoid jargon; emphasize action.
instructions: 1) propose variants for title, body, cta, helper text, and error states. 2) suggest tone alternatives (formal, casual). 3) include a11y notes and char limits.
model_tips: prefer simple words and short sentences.
